mvc.controllers

Class GamePlayController.FieldDrawAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.javafx.animation.ExtendedAnimationTimer
      • mvc.controllers.GamePlayController.FieldDrawAnimation
  • Enclosing class:
    GamePlayController

    private class GamePlayController.FieldDrawAnimation
extends ExtendedAnimationTimer
    Animation of pointer's spawn. Wrapped in class because it's easier to make javadoc for class, not for variable or field. By the way, what this animation does?
    1. Firstly, there're two loops (for iterating x and y points). Idea is to wait time (it's in CELL_DRAW_STEP_DELAY) between iterating steps. There're any for loops in this class, but they're implemented with two variables (x and y) and if statements.
    2. When all cells are drown - class starts doing animation for GP. There're three steps:
      1. Drawing GP with normal color;
      2. Drawing GP with inverted color (to make blink effect);
      3. Drawing GP with normal color and ending animation.
      And, after those all, class setups controls, such as GP control.
